str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.
A primary particle; down, in varied relations (genitive, dative or accusative) with which it is joined).

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
Hardness, hardness of heart, obstinacy, perverseness. From skleros; callousness, i.e. stubbornness.
Prolonged from a primary kar; the heart, i.e. the thoughts or feelings; also the middle.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: To store up, treasure up, save, lay up. From thesauros; to amass or reserve.
From oregomai; properly, desire, i.e., violent passion (justifiable) abhorrence); by implication punishment.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 2nd Person Singular

str2: In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
A day, the period from sunrise to sunset.
From oregomai; properly, desire, i.e., violent passion (justifiable) abhorrence); by implication punishment.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.
Just judging, just judgment. From dikaios and krisis; a just sentence.
An unveiling, uncovering, revealing, revelation. From apokalupto; disclosure.
